column2: source("02_forestmodels_c.R")
com_names <- c("Myocardial\ninfarction",
"Congestive\nheart failure",
"Peripheral\nvascular disease",
"Cerebrovascular\ndisease",
"Dementia",
"Chronic obstructive\npulmonary disease",
"Rheumatoid\ndisease",
"Peptic ulcer\ndisease",
"Mild liver\ndisease",
"Diabetes without\nchronic complications",
"Diabetes with\nchronic complications",
"Hemiplegia or\nparaplegia",
"Renal disease",
"Cancer (any malignancy)",
"Moderate or severe liver disease",
"Metastatic solid tumour",
"AIDS/HIV")
list_name <- setNames(as.list(com_names), com_short)
var_label(resm) <- list_name
ami      <- glm(cost ~ ami      , family = "poisson", data = resm)
chf      <- glm(cost ~ chf      , family = "poisson", data = resm)
pvd      <- glm(cost ~ pvd      , family = "poisson", data = resm)
cevd     <- glm(cost ~ cevd     , family = "poisson", data = resm)
dementia <- glm(cost ~ dementia , family = "poisson", data = resm)
copd     <- glm(cost ~ copd     , family = "poisson", data = resm)
rheumd   <- glm(cost ~ rheumd   , family = "poisson", data = resm)
pud      <- glm(cost ~ pud      , family = "poisson", data = resm)
mld      <- glm(cost ~ mld      , family = "poisson", data = resm)
diab     <- glm(cost ~ diab     , family = "poisson", data = resm)
diabwc   <- glm(cost ~ diabwc   , family = "poisson", data = resm)
hp       <- glm(cost ~ hp       , family = "poisson", data = resm)
rend     <- glm(cost ~ rend     , family = "poisson", data = resm)
msld     <- glm(cost ~ msld     , family = "poisson", data = resm)
metacanc <- glm(cost ~ metacanc , family = "poisson", data = resm)
aids     <- glm(cost ~ aids     , family = "poisson", data = resm)
Age      <- glm(cost ~ Age      , family = "poisson", data = resm)
Gender   <- glm(cost ~ Gender   , family = "poisson", data = resm)
BMI      <- glm(cost ~ BMI      , family = "poisson", data = resm)
Diag     <- glm(cost ~ Diag     , family = "poisson", data = resm)
fit_uni <- list(Age,Gender,Diag,ami,chf,pvd,cevd,copd,rheumd,pud,mld,diab)
fit_mul <- glm(cost ~ Age+ Gender+Diag+BMI+Diagnoses+ami+chf+pvd+cevd+copd+rheumd+pud+mld+diab, family = "poisson", data = resm)
ap6 <- lars_forestmodel(fit = fit_mul, lst = fit_uni, palb =pala, pala="grey60")
ap6
